reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects personal data and describes the types of data collected.
reply.reference: We will collect personal data that you submit or which we collect through your use of our properties. We may disclose this personal data to Active Group’s customers, and third-party service providers as described in more detail below. URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Contact Information (such as name, email, address, and telephone number) and Analytical Information (such as pages viewed, browser type, operating system, device information, mobile operating system, and mobile device identifier).

content: Contact Information (name, email, address, telephone number)
Analytical Information (pages viewed, browser type, operating system, device information, mobile operating system, mobile device identifier)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the types of data collected under 'Information Collection and Use'. The Contact Information and Analytical Information are detailed as the types of data collected by the app.
reply.reference: Your name, email, address and/or telephone number (“Contact Information”). Pages viewed, emails from us that you opened, browser type, operating system, and device information, your mobile operating system (OS), a mobile device identifier embedded by us, or other commonly used mobile device identifier if you access the Site on a mobile device (“Analytical Information”). URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states how the collected data, including Contact Information, Analytical Information, and other Personal Data, may be used for purposes such as improving performance, personalization, troubleshooting, and communication with users. These purposes are clearly declared.
reply.reference: How Your Personal Data May Be Used We may use Analytical Information to improve the performance or layout of our website; to develop new services and ideas; and to better administer and troubleshoot our systems. URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can exercise various rights including the right to withdraw consent, the right to data portability, the right to erasure/right to be forgotten, and the right to restriction of processing. These rights give users the ability to opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data.
reply.reference: You have the right to notify Active Group that you no longer want them to process or use your Personal Data... You have the right to obtain a copy of your Personal Data stored and processed by Active Group and direct Active Group to transfer your Personal Data to another controller... You have the right to request that any of your Personal Data being stored or processed by Active Group is deleted... You may request that Active Group restrict the processing of your Personal Data... URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that personal data may be disclosed to Active Group's customers and third-party service providers. It also mentions sharing information with companies working on behalf of Active Group to provide products or services.
reply.reference: We may disclose this personal data to Active Group’s customers, and third-party service providers. We will share your Personal Data to other companies or people when...we need to send the information to companies who work on behalf of Active Group to provide a product or service to you. Unless we tell you differently, we only provide these companies the minimum amount of information that is necessary for them to assist us. URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with companies who work on behalf of Active Group to provide a product or service, ensuring they have the minimum amount of necessary information. Other than that, the app does not share Personal Data with any other person or company.

content: Companies working on behalf of Active Group

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates that the app shares data with companies who assist Active Group in providing a product or service, ensuring a minimal amount of information is shared. However, Personal Data is not shared with any other person or company.
reply.reference: Unless we tell you differently, we only provide these companies the minimum amount of information that is necessary for them to assist us and these companies do not have any right to use the Personal Data we provide to them beyond what is necessary to assist us; URL: https://pnthn.com/privacy.
